attributes.action: grant the right to vote in UK Parliamentary elections, as well as local elections, to EU citizens who have been continuously resident in the UK for 10 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is unfair that EU citizens who have been resident in the UK for a long time, and paid UK taxes, cannot vote in Parliamentary elections. After all, the lives of long-term residents are much more affected by the decisions of this government than those of their countries of origin, if indeed they are still eligible to vote there.
